import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Environment } from '../../../src/components/environment'; import axios from 'axios'; import { If, Then, Else, Switch, Case} from 'react-if'; import Header from '../../../src/layouts/header'; import TodayDeal from '../../../src/layouts/todays_deal'; import Footer from '../../../src/layouts/footer'; import ReactHtmlParser, { processNodes, convertNodeToElement, htmlparser2 } from 'react-html-parser'; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel2'; class ProductDetail extends Component{ constructor (props) { super(props); this.state = { getProductDetail: [], } let id = this.props.match.params.id; axios.get(Environment.apiurl+'/product/details/'+id) .then(result => { if(result){ console.log(result.data); this.setState({getProductDetail: result.data.response}); } }); } render() { const options1 = { items: 1, // dots:false, callbacks:true, // nav:true, loop:true, autoplay: true, autoplayTimeout:3500, smartSpeed:800, singleItem:true, // navText: ["",""], responsiveClass:true, }; const options2 = { margin:10, items: 4, dots:false, callbacks:true, // nav:true, loop:true, autoplay: true, autoplayTimeout:3500, smartSpeed:800, singleItem:true, // navText: ["",""], responsiveClass:true, }; return (
